Player History
Earned first career win on 4/24/1985...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,878,571 through salary arbitration...
Signed as a free agent by Montreal on 2/10/1987 to a 4-year deal worth $4,775,000 per year...
Traded from Montreal to Los Angeles on 6/10/1989 (Going to LAD: P Mark Davis, P Manny Hernandez, P Roy Smith. Going to MON: LF Keith Mitchell, RF Lou Frazier)...
Had first career hit on 7/24/1989, off Joe Johnson (ATL)...
6/1/1990: Signed a contract extension with Los Angeles, $1,850,000 per year, for 3 years.
